document.body:
&projects; Jmol Applet for Folding@home
createFahPage( "Select project", "Project", "Project Name", "Credit", "Number of atoms", "Preferred", "Final deadline", "Frames", "Code", "Project description", "Hide solvent", " files / projects.", "If you have current.xyz files for the missing projects, please send them at nicove@users.sourceforge.net", "Missing projects" );
